channel.title: Latex on A minimal Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content in Latex on A minimal Hugo website

item.title: insert basic image into latex
item.description: Insert a single image into Latex. \begin{figure}[H] \centering \includegraphics[width=\textwidth]{../images/report/filename} \vspace{0.1cm} \caption{} \label{} \end{figure}

item.title: underline words and sentences in latex
item.description: \usepackage[normalem]{ulem} \uline{this will be underlined!} See this post for a further explanation on benefits of this approach for underlining. There are several different ways to underline in Latex.
